1309240.name: Fantasy Grounds - Heroes of High Fantasy: Fires of War
1309240.description:
Heroes of High Fantasy: Fires of War

Rivalries boil, schemes ferment, chains break. This is the tinder for the fires of war. Will the new recruits be consumed by the flames?
Jump into this Heroes of High Fantasy Adventure's introduction to the characters in Ultimate NPCs: Warfare!
  • Session: 3-4 Hours
  • Variable Difficulty Adventure (VDA)
  • Compatible with the 5th edition of D&D
Fires of War is a single-session adventure, designed to be played at any level, and can be easily tailored to fit any fantasy campaign setting.
It is intended to be used as a supplement to Ultimate NPCs: Warfare or can serve as a jumping off point for a warfare-based adventure or campaign!
Note: This product requires Ultimate NPCs: Warfare
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
RyanWeathers
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
